title: Video: Billie Marten – Lionhearted
content:
Billie Marten’s debut album, Writing of Blues and Yellows, is shaping up rather beautifully, with latest single Lionhearted being the fifth track lifted from it.

Whilst her early demos showed tremendous promise, these new tracks feel far more mature and part of a fully realised sound – yet maintain the emotional fragility that’s now become such a distinctive part of her aesthetic. Check out Lionhearted below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
